org.mmbase.util.transformers

Class Censor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.util.transformers.ReaderTransformer
      • org.mmbase.util.transformers.ConfigurableReaderTransformer
        • org.mmbase.util.transformers.ChunkedTransformer<Pattern>
          • org.mmbase.util.transformers.RegexpReplacer
            • org.mmbase.util.transformers.Censor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CharTransformer, ConfigurableTransformer, Transformer

    public class Censor
extends RegexpReplacer
    Replaces certain 'forbidden' words by something more decent. Of course, censoring is evil, but sometimes it can be amusing too. This is only an example implementation.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.7
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
